entries.title: Static Styleguide post
intro: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore. et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris

content: I decline the title of Iron Cook and accept the lesser title of Zinc Saucier, which I just made up. Uhh… also, comes with double prize money. Fry, you can't just sit here in the dark listening to classical music. Look, everyone wants to be like Germany, but do we really have the pure strength of 'will'? Fatal. Dear God, they'll be killed on our doorstep! And there's no trash pickup until January 3rd. Leela's gonna kill me.

I've been there. My folks were always on me to groom myself and wear underpants. What am I, the pope? Now, now. Perfectly symmetrical violence never solved anything. Yep, I remember. They came in last at the Olympics, then retired to promote alcoholic beverages!
• Okay, it's 500 dollars, you have no choice of carrier, the battery can't hold the charge and the reception isn't very…
• Isn't it true that you have been paid for your testimony?
Why Must I Be a Crustacean in Love?

In your time, yes, but nowadays shut up! Besides, these are adult stemcells, harvested from perfectly healthy adults whom I killed for their stemcells. Oh, you're a dollar naughtier than most. Fry, you can't just sit here in the dark listening to classical music. Tell her she looks thin. And then the battle's not so bad? Morbo can't understand his teleprompter because he forgot how you say that letter that's shaped like a man wearing a hat.
Soothe us with sweet lies. Are you crazy? I can't swallow that. You, minion. Lift my arm. AFTER HIM! No! The cat shelter's on to me.
